articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Tomb of Zhang Weihua
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath on Demise of Zhang Weihua
Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un sent a wreath on the occasion of the 80th anniversary of demise of Zhang Weihua, Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle.
					 The wreath was laid before the tomb of martyr Zhang Weihua in Fusong County, Jilin Province, China.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Centenarian
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Centenarian
Kyongwon, November 1 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un sent a birthday spread to So Ok Ju residing in Anwon-ri, Kyongwon County on her 100th birthday.
					 The centenarian, who was born into a poor peasant family before the liberation of the country, keenly experienced the grief of being a member of the stateless nation, maltreated and humiliated under the colonial rule by the Japanese imperialists
					
					 It was not until President Kim Il Sung liberated the once usurped country that she could live a genuine life and worked honestly as an agricultural worker. She continued working even in retirement.
					
					 She lives optimistically, having a balanced diet.

articles.title: Korea-Europe Association Spokesperson Blasts NATO Secretary General for His Rubbish
articles.content:
Korea-Europe Association Spokesperson Blasts NATO Secretary General for His Rubbish
Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- A spokesperson for the Korea-Europe Association Wednesday issued the following press statement:
					 During his recent visit to Japan, the secretary general of NATO absurdly claimed that he was concerned about the north Korean missiles which are capable of reaching most parts of Europe and the western states of the U.S. and that the nuclear and missile programme of north Korea is a threat to Europe and the rest of the world that demands international response. 
					
					 Before leaving for Japan he had an interview with Japanese media at which he said that NATO had the resolve and capability to strike back to protect its member states from the ballistic missiles of north Korea, and that north Korea should be made to pay if it continued to pursue nuclear and missile development.
					
					 It is a wicked sophistry of turning things upside down to condemn our possession of nukes as "a threat to Europe and the rest of the world". 
					
					 The confrontation between the DPRK and the U.S. whereby the U.S. poses nuclear threat to the DPRK while considering it a hostile country and the DPRK stands up to the U.S. to defend the dignity and sovereignty of the country and nation; this is the true picture of the situation on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 As we have made it clear on several occasions including the UN General Assembly, the DPRK has no intention of using or threatening to use its nuclear weapons against any other countries as long as they do not take part in the U.S. military action against the DPRK. It is ridiculous for the secretary general of NATO, who is all too well aware of the stance of the DPRK, to rhyme with Trump and his remarks about the "global threat" like a little parrot. 
					
					 It is obvious that NATO is an organization that relies on the U.S. military, but it is still hard to understand why the secretary general, for the head of the organization he is, would imitate Trump more zealously than any U.S. citizen or official of the U.S. administration that he is not.
					
					 The intention of the secretary general of NATO who denies the essence of the Korean peninsula issue and makes a U.S. stooge of himself cannot be construed otherwise than pursuing a wicked aim of a certain kind. 
					
					 His deliberate promotion of the idea of "threats of north Korean missiles on Europe" implies that he is anxious to instigate NATO member states into confrontation with the DPRK and create an atmosphere favorable for NATO's involvement in the war when it breaks out on the Korean peninsula. 
					
					 The NATO secretary general should be fully aware that his reckless acts of kowtowing to the U.S. would only bring danger to Europe, and he had better behave with discretion.

articles.title: Greetings to Algerian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Algerian President
Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Abdelaziz Bouteflika, president of the People's Democratic Republic of Algeria, on the occasion of the 63rd anniversary of the start of revolution in Algeria.
					 Expressing belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the interests of the peoples of the two countries, the message wished the president good health and happiness and the Algerian people progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to Algerian PM
articles.content:
Greetings to Algerian PM
Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea and vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Ahmed Ouyahia, prime minister of Algeria, on the occasion of the 63rd anniversary of the start of the Algerian revolution.
					 The message wished the prime minister and his government bigger success in their work for developing the country's economy and improving the people's standard of living.
					
					 On the same day, DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho sent a similar message to his Algerian counterpart Abdelkader Messahel.

articles.title: Congratulations to PM of New Zealand
articles.content:
Congratulations to PM of New Zealand
Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea and vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, on Oct. 30 sent a congratulatory message to Jacinda Kate Laurell Ardern upon her appointment as prime minister of New Zealand.
					 The message wished the prime minister success in her work for the country's development and people's wellbeing.
					
					 On the same day, DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho sent a similar message to Winston Reymond Peters upon his appointment as vice-prime minister and foreign minister of New Zealand.

articles.title: Friendly Meeting with Indonesian Embassy Officials
articles.content:
Friendly Meeting with Indonesian Embassy Officials
Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- A friendly meeting with staff members of the Indonesian embassy here was held at the embassy on Wednesday to mark the Youth Day of Indonesia.
					 Present there were Jo Chol Ryong, vice-chairman of the DPRK-Indonesia Friendship Association, teachers and students from DPRK-Indonesia Friendship Ryulgok Senior Middle School in Songyo District and Bambang Hiendrasto, Indonesian ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials.
					
					 Speeches were there.
					
					 The participants talked to each other about the development of the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries before enjoying an art performance of schoolchildren.
					
					 The embassy members donated educational equipment to the senior middle school.

articles.title: Letter of DPRK Permanent Representative Distributed as UN Document
articles.content:
Letter of DPRK Permanent Representative Distributed as UN Document
Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- A letter sent by the DPRK permanent representative at the United Nations to the president of UNSC was distributed as an official document A/72/545-S/2017/882 of the UN General Assembly and the UN Security Council on October 28.
					 The letter branded the large-scale naval joint military exercises staged by the U.S. in its attempt to launch a preemptive nuclear strike against the DPRK as clear threat to the international peace and security and requested the UN Security Council to bring up the exercises as its urgent agenda item for discussion.

articles.title: Functional Nano Plastic Sheet Developed
articles.content:
Functional Nano Plastic Sheet Developed
Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- Scientists of the Institute of Agricultural Science in the DPRK developed high-quality functional nano plastic sheet.
					 It is 1.2 times stronger than ordinary plastic sheet in tensile strength, 2 times higher in elongation percentage and 1.5-2 times longer in serviceable life.
					
					 The production process of functional nano plastic sheet was set up in a short span of time.
					
					 The functional nano plastic sheet has been introduced into different units to prove effective in raising temperature of rice-seedling beds and germination rate, while enjoying great demand for its high quality and low cost.
					
					 It was highly appreciated at the national nano sci-tech exhibition-2017 held some days ago.

articles.title: Light Industrial Establishments Boost Production in DPRK
articles.content:
Light Industrial Establishments Boost Production in DPRK
Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- The 28th National Exhibition of Consumer Goods held in the DPRK some days ago was a clear manifestation of developing light industry in the DPRK. On display at the exhibition were various goods in high demand, including knitwear, quality cloth and shoes.
					 Light industrial establishments across the country boost production by bringing science and technology close to production based on indigenous raw materials.
					
					 The Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Textile Mill manufactured duplex tooth-belt die to put the production of cloth on a normal basis and the Sariwon Textile Mill introduced laser technology into production of various patterned cloth.
					
					 The Phyongsong Artificial Leather Factory succeeded in confirming technical conditions for production of artificial leather based on emulsion vinyl chloride, while the Wonsan Shoes Factory and Pyongyang and Sunchon shoes factories increase production with locally available raw materials through technical innovations.
					
					 The same is true of other light industrial establishments throughout the country.

articles.title: New Novel Published
articles.content:
New Novel Published
Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- The April 15 Literary Production Company has recently brought out a new novel "Bulwark" (author: Pang Thae Il) of the cycle of novels "Immortal History."
					 The novel gives an artistic depiction of the exploits President Kim Il Sung performed by frustrating the moves of the U.S. and the traitorous puppet regime of south Korea and inspiring all Koreans to the sacred struggle for national reunification after the liberation of the country.
					
					 It also deals with the exploits the President performed by forming the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea and realizing the merger of the workers' parties in the north and the south and thus turning the DPRK into an invincible bulwark for national reunification in a matter of two years since its founding.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Authorities' Reckless Action
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Authorities' Reckless Action
Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday carries an article on the lapse of one year since the candlelight resistance to force traitor Park Geun Hye to step down started in south Korea. 
					 The large-scale candlelight action of the south Korean people was an eruption of pent-up wrath and anger on Park Geun Hye, the article says, adding:
					
					 The collapse of the Park regime clearly proved how miserable the fate of the group of traitors was as they went reckless in the fascist dictatorship rule and hideous irregularities and corruption backed by outside forces and mercilessly trampled down the desire of reunification and patriotism sought by all Koreans.
					
					 One year has passed since the candlelight resistance. The ruling forces changed. Nothing has changed fundamentally.
					
					 First of all, the puppet conservative group which was driven into tight corner owing to the candlelight action is reviving, making desperate efforts to challenge the desire of candlelight demonstrators.
					
					 Meanwhile, the puppet conservative group is viciously blocking the work to eradicate conservative evils as demanded by all the south Korean people.
					
					 Under such situation, riffraff of ultra-right conservative organizations who prolonged their remaining days with the help of traitor Park Geun Hye rampage through the streets in an attempt to save the witch, the living dead, asserting for the puppet traitor's "acquittal." 
					
					 What merits a more serious attention is that the present south Korean authorities which took the power owing to the candlelight action are committing treacherous acts while shunning the public mind-set of candlelight holders.
					
					 Their reckless action reminiscent of the confrontation rackets of traitors Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye convinces the people from all walks of life aspiring after peace and reunification that nothing can be expected from the present regime.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Ridicules S. Korean Authorities for Begging for "Cooperation over Nuclear Issue of North"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Ridicules S. Korean Authorities for Begging for "Cooperation over Nuclear Issue of North"
Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet authorities are getting ever more frantic in begging outsiders for "cooperation over the nuclear issue of the north".
					 When Kang Kyong Hwa, puppet foreign minister, made trips to some European countries, she begged for "concerted sanctions and pressure" of the international community to lead someone to a "negotiation for denuclearization". Earlier, when meeting with an official of the Japanese Foreign Ministry in Seoul, she prattled that it was important for south Korea, U.S. and Japan to "coordinately cooperate" over the "nuclear issue of the north".
					
					 Meanwhile, the puppet Minister of Unification Jo Myong Gyun showed up at various international conferences where he begged for tougher anti-DPRK sanctions and pressure, trumpeting about "a problem concerned about by the whole world" and "close international cooperation". He also called for "response to the efforts of the international community" and "a proper choice".
					
					 This is no more than last-ditch efforts of mad dogs obeying the U.S. fear-stricken by the DPRK which is about to round off the state nuclear force, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a commentary.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces, carried away with pro-U.S. sycophancy and engrossed in confrontation with the fellow countrymen, are trying to subdue the DPRK through the intensified cooperation with the outsiders in sanctions and pressure, which sounds like nothing but a pipedream wishing sea water would dry out, says the commentary, adding:
					
					 If they continue to run amuck, unaware of where is a way for ensuring peace and security of the Korean peninsula and of what is the fundamental interest of the nation, they will get nothing but a disgrace of being called modern-day five traitors of 1905.
					
					 The present south Korean ruling forces should not act rashly if they do not want to meet the same as the miserable fate of Park Geun Hye who ran wild in the standoff with the north in alliance with outsiders.

articles.title: DPRK's Measures for Bolstering up Nuclear Deterrence Is Legitimate: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK's Measures for Bolstering up Nuclear Deterrence Is Legitimate: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- U.S. major media and experts on the Korean affairs are strongly asserting that the military threat by Trump's administration is making the DPRK confident of the validity of its accession to nuclear weapons.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says that it goes to prove that the U.S. is, indeed, the offender, arch criminal escalating tension on the Korean Peninsula and harasser of peace and it is just that the DPRK has rapidly developed the nuclear force under the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts.
					
					 The commentary says that the reality proved that the line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force advanced by the Workers' Party of Korea is the most just one and the DPRK's option for rapidly bolstering up the nuclear force was entirely right.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 If the DPRK had failed in having access to the war deterrent and capability of retaliatory strike like some countries and had not bolstered up them in quality and quantity, the country's sovereignty and national dignity would have been mercilessly violated as the target of the U.S. aggression.
					
					 Now the Trump's group are driving the situation on the Korean peninsula to the brink of a war while making such muscle-flexing as deploying nuclear strategic assets including nuclear carrier Ronald Reagan in south Korea and its vicinity but they will get nothing but international denunciation, shame and ruin.
					
					 It has become clearer who is a harasser of peace and an assailant of threat. Owing to the U.S., there is constant danger of a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula and peace and security is always at peril.
					
					 As long as the U.S. moves for stifling the DPRK continue, the latter will hold fast to the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts and proudly exercise its right to self-defense granted by international law no matter what others may say.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams Japanese Reactionaries' Act to Revive Militarism
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams Japanese Reactionaries' Act to Revive Militarism
Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries are getting all the more pronounced in their moves to call back the departed soul of militarism.
					 Prime Minister Abe made an offering to Yasukuni Shrine on the occasion of the autumn ancestral rites and the aide to him visited the shrine instead of him.
					
					 A commentary of Minju Joson Wednesday notes that the Japanese reactionaries' frequent tribute to the Yasukuni Shrine is not aimed to observe etiquette and morality for ancestors.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries regard the shrine as an ideological and mental center for militarist revision.
					
					 Their acts to revive the blood-stained past are an outright challenge to human conscience and justice, and an intolerable act against humanity.
					
					 They seek to open up the future of the country through militarist actions but they are gravely mistaken.
					
					 Their desperate acts to realize overseas aggression while doggedly denying the blood-stained past crimes, being carried away with the departed soul of militarism which was sternly punished by history, will only make the future of Japan gloomier.
					
					 The future of Japan dreaming of militarist revival can not be otherwise just as the Japanese imperialists drank a bitter cup of defeat while getting keen on continental aggression.

articles.title: Minju Joson Flails U.S.-Japan-S. Korea Military Nexus against DPRK
articles.content:
Minju Joson Flails U.S.-Japan-S. Korea Military Nexus against DPRK
Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- U.S. Defense Secretary Mattis, Japan Defense Minister Onodera and south Korean puppet Defense Minister Song Yong Mu held the 9th U.S.-Japan-south Korea defense ministerial talks in the Philippines some days ago. Earlier, south Korea and Japan held defense ministerial talks where they trumpeted about "close cooperation" while getting vocal about "nuclear threats from the north".
					 Minju Joson Wednesday in a commentary says this proves that the U.S., Japan and south Korea remain unchanged in their vaulting ambition for a nuclear war against the DPRK, aimed at bringing it down by force, and their ambition is getting reckless with each passing day.
					
					 The military get-together among the three parties is a dangerous confab to speed up the building of triangular military alliance under the pretext of "nuclear and missile threats from the north" and hold a hegemonic position in the Korean peninsula and the region after stopping the DPRK from bolstering the nuclear force for self-defence, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The reckless military action of the hostile forces clearly proves that the DPRK was quite just when it decided to bolster the nuclear deterrence for self-defence, and that the aggressors and provokers have to be tamed with fire, not with words.
					
					 The U.S., Japan and the south Korean puppet warmongers had better bear in mind that the nightmare can come true by which the U.S. mainland is reduced to ashes, the Japanese archipelago is buried at the bottom of the Pacific and the whole south Korean land is destroyed, should they ride roughshod over, without understanding the strategic position of the DPRK and without properly judging the change of the times.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Prosecutes Former Officials of Chongwadae for Their Abuses of Power
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Prosecutes Former Officials of Chongwadae for Their Abuses of Power
Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean online newspaper Tongil News, the Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea prosecuted former officials of Chongwadae for their abuses of power on October 30.
					 The organization said it was disclosed that four officials of Chongwadae including the former presidential chief secretary branded it as "forces following the north" because it struggled against the "agreement" on the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					 It stated that it prosecuted them for their abuses of power to make the case clear.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Launches Actions against U.S. War Moves
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Launches Actions against U.S. War Moves
Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea reportedly launched actions in Seoul on Oct. 28 to protest against the war moves of the U.S. imperialists and the puppet authorities.
					 It held a press conference outside the Defense Ministry building.
					
					 Noting that a south Korea-U.S. annual security consultation was to be held that day to discuss the expansive deployment of the U.S. strategic assets in south Korea, the matter of ratcheting up military pressure upon the north and purchase of nuclear-powered subs and U.S.-made weaponry, the speakers said the expansive deployment will only stoke the nuclear confrontation in Northeast Asia and offer Japan an excuse and opportunity for reinvading the peninsula.
					
					 They urged the U.S. to halt the large-scale joint military drills.
					
					 They picketed along the road in front of the Defense Ministry.
					
					 Then, they held a No-THAAD rally together with inhabitants of Sosong-ri, Songju County and Kim Chon City of North Kyongsang Province near Chongwadae.
					
					 Speakers at the rally urged the regime to halt the THAAD deployment project and its operation if it is something for a temporary use as it claims.
					
					 Withdrawal of THAAD is a stern order given by the public, they said.
					
					 They headed for the U.S. embassy and picketed in front of it protesting against the U.S. hostile policy toward the north and expressing their will to get THAAD withdrawn and achieve peace.

articles.title: Anti-Trump Rally Held in Jonju, South Korea
articles.content:
Anti-Trump Rally Held in Jonju, South Korea
Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- There took place an anti-Trump rally in Jonju City of south Korea on Oct. 27 under the sponsorship of the Anti-Trump, Anti-U.S. Actions Headquarters amid the No-Trump, No-War actions getting stronger across south Korea.
					 Speakers at the rally accused Trump of spouting war-inciting remarks every day.
					
					 Noting Trump's visit to south Korea will only add fuel to the tensions on Korean peninsula, they urged the regime to opt for defusing the present danger of war.
					
					 Then, a statement was read out.
					
					 The statement termed Trump "Hitler in the 21st century" and denounced him for bringing nuclear aircraft carrier strike groups to the vicinity of the peninsula one after another only to escalate tensions.
					
					 It accused the regime of joining the U.S. in its crazy moves for a war, far from preventing it.
					
					 It censured Representative Hong Jun Phyo of the "Liberal Korea Party" for asking the U.S. to redeploy tactical nukes in south Korea during his junket to the U.S.
					
					 It expressed the will to stage a resolute struggle against Trump's moves for igniting a war against the north.
					
					 If Trump fails to stop the war moves, fierce actions will break out across south Korea against him and the U.S., the statement warned.

articles.title: Trump's Anti-DPRK Rubbish Ridiculed
articles.content:
Trump's Anti-DPRK Rubbish Ridiculed
Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- Trump, at an interview regarding his projected junket to south Korea and other Asian countries, bluffed that the U.S. is so fully prepared to cope with the provocation from north Korea that one cannot believe its readiness and that one will be greatly shocked to see how well prepared the U.S. is,. He, affirmatively estimating the sanctions put on the north by the country bordering the DPRK, even made flattering remarks that the country and the U.S. have extremely unusual good relations and the country is helping the U.S. in the true sense of the words. 
					 Minju Joson in a commentary Wednesday brands this as rubbish to militarily bring down the DPRK and strangle it through sanctions, emphasizing this only glaringly reveals the deplorable position of the political idiot driven into the tight corner, let alone frightening others.
					
					 Trump's vituperation is a product of a stop-gap measure prompted by his uneasiness and anxiousness after his futile attempt to stifle the DPRK through the military pressure and sanctions racket. 
					
					 No matter whatever rubbish Trump may utter, that can never take the army and people of the DPRK by surprise. We know what we should do.
					
					 The DPRK's cause of building the state nuclear force has already entered the phase in which the goal for the final completion has attained.
					
					 What remains to be done is to humble the U.S. arrogance, demonstrate the might of Juche Korea and bring peace to the world.
					
					 The Trump and his group had better behave with prudence, judging the DPRK's tremendous nuclear deterrence of justice that has incredibly been well-prepared.

articles.title: Foreign Internet Homepages Observe 72nd WPK Birthday
articles.content:
Foreign Internet Homepages Observe 72nd WPK Birthday
Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- Foreign internet homepages gave special write-ups to the 72nd birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) between October 7 and 10.
					 The Brazilian Center for the Study of Songun Politics posted an article titled "72nd anniversary of the WPK" with art work and photos showing President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, the flag of the WPK, the Monument to Party Founding, etc.
					
					 The article said that the WPK is devotedly working to provide the people with happier life under the guidance of respected Comrade Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The internet homepage of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany praised Kim Il Sung's feats for the founding of a Juche-type revolutionary party in an article "By realizing the historic cause of founding the party" illustrated with his photo.
					
					 Russia's internet homepage Grifon Prestsizh said, in an article "Kim Jong Un, chairman of the WPK" illustrated with his photo, that all the activities of Chairman Kim Jong Un are recorded as an epic of giving importance to the people and respecting and loving them.
					
					 The group for the study of the Juche idea at a university in Venezuela posted on the internet homepage Juche Idea articles titled "Kim Jong Il, immortal party building exploits" and "Political mode of the WPK", which lauded leader Kim Jong Il's history of guidance over the party.

articles.title: Russian and Brazilian Media Observe 91st Anniversary of Formation of DIU
articles.content:
Russian and Brazilian Media Observe 91st Anniversary of Formation of DIU
Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- Russian and Brazilian media carried an art work depicting President Kim Il Sung and special write-ups titled "President Kim Il Sung who provided historic roots of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK)" and "'Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU) and the WPK" in the period between October 9 and 22 to mark the 91st anniversary of the formation of the DIU.
					 The Russian paper Zavtra said that the President formed the DIU with younger revolutionaries on October 17, 1926 and set forth the immediate tasks and final aim of the DIU.
					
					 Such story was also posted on the Russian websites Irkutskblogspot. ru, Patrioti Moskva and DPRK Today.
					
					 The online magazine Lemchich and the internet homepage of the Brazilian Center for the Study of Songun Politics introduced the significance of the formation of the DIU.

articles.title: Works of Peerlessly Great Men Studied Abroad
articles.content:
Works of Peerlessly Great Men Studied Abroad
Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- A reading session, briefing and seminar on peerlessly great men took place in Angola, Spain and Slovenia in the period between October 2 and 13 to mark the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and its 72nd founding anniversary and the 91st anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU).
					 An official of an Angolan state bank said at the reading session on "4. The First Party Organization-the Society for Rallying Comrades" from "Chapter 4. Seeking a New Path" of Vol. 2 of Part 1 The Anti-Japanese Revolution of "With the Century", the reminiscences of President Kim Il Sung:
					
					 The first genuine party organization of Korea was formed by President Kim Il Sung and he founded the revolutionary Workers' Party of Korea absolutely supported and trusted by the popular masses.
					
					 I wish the Korean people greater success in the future under the wise leadership of the WPK which holds HE Kim Jong Un at the top position in high esteem.
					
					 At the seminar on Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is a Juche-Type Revolutionary Party Which Inherited the Glorious Tradition of the DIU" held at the Madrid Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Spain, the speakers said that they had a deep understanding of the position and role of the leader in the revolutionary struggle of the working class and the guiding idea of the WPK. The just cause of the Korean people will surely emerge victorious as they advance forward under the leadership of the WPK, they added.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral por el dia del fallecimiento de Zhang Weihua
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral por el dia del fallecimiento de Zhang Weihua
Pyongyang, primero de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un envio la ofrenda floral con motivo del 80o aniversario del fallecimiento de Zhang Weihua, chino relacionado con la lucha revolucionaria antijaponesa.
					La ofrenda floral fue depositada al Cementerio de Martir Zhang Weihua, situado en el distrito de Fusong de la provincia de Jilin de China.

articles.title: Vocero de Asociacion Corea-Europa denuncia chismes de Secretario General de OTAN
articles.content:
Vocero de Asociacion Corea-Europa denuncia chismes de Secretario General de OTAN
Pyongyang, primero de noviembre (ACNC) -- El vocero de la Asociacion Corea-Europa hizo publica hoy la siguiente declaracion:
					Durante su reciente visita a Japon, el secretario general de la OTAN dijo tonterias de que se preocupa de que el Norte de Corea posee los misiles capaces de atacar la mayor parte de Europa y la region occidental de EE.UU. y que se necesita la confrontacion mundial con el plan nuclear y de misiles del Norte de Corea que se sirve de la amenaza al mundo.
					
					En un interviu con los medios de prensa japoneses sostenido en visperas de esa gira, tambien parloteo que la OTAN tiene la determinacion y la capacidad de contraataque para defender a sus paises miembros desde los misiles balisticos del Norte de Corea y que este pagara el precio merecido si continua su  desarrollo de armas nucleares y misiles.
					
					El acto de describir la posesion de armas nucleares por parte de la RPDC como la "amenaza a Europa y los restos del mundo" constituye una retorica que convierte lo blanco en lo negro.
					
					La esencia de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana es la confrontacion entre EE.UU., que hostiliza a la RPDC y le da a esta la amenaza nuclear, y la RPDC que trata de defender su dignidad y su soberania frente a ello.
					
					Como ha aclarado en varias ocasiones inclusive en la Asamblea General de la ONU, la RPDC no tiene la voluntad de emplear o amenazar con las armas nucleares contra otros paises que no participan en los actos militares de EE.UU. contra la RPDC. Si bien conoce este hecho, el secretario general de la OTAN repite como papagayo las palabras de Trump que habla de la "amenaza mundial".
					
					Es un hecho consumado que la OTAN es el organo apoyado en las fuerzas militares del pais norteamericano. Pero, resulta muy incomprensible el secretario general de la OTAN que sin ser estadounidense imitara a Trump mas que los funcionarios de la administracion norteamericana.
					
					La actitud del secretario general de la OTAN, quien se porta como sirviente de EE.UU dando vista gorda a la esencia del problema de la Peninsula Coreana, deja conocer que el mismo persigue un objetivo malsano.
					
					La conducta de ese secretario que divulga de modo intencional el "rumor de amenaza de misiles norcoreanos a Europa" demuestra claramente que el esta muy ansioso para incitar a los paises miembros de la OTAN de Europa a la confrontacion con la RPDC y crear asi el ambiente favorable para introducir la OTAN en la guerra en el tiempo emergente de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					El secretario general de la OTAN debe actuar con juicio al tener bien presente de que su obediencia a EE.UU. constituye un acto que crea la amenaza en Europa.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente argelino
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente argelino
Pyongyang, primero de noviembre (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia primero un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica Argelina Democratica y Popular, Abdelaziz Bouteflika, con motivo del 63o aniversario del inicio de la Revolucion Argelina.
					Convencido de que las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre Corea y Argelia se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran aun mas conforme a los intereses de los pueblos de ambos paises, el remitente formulo votos por la buena salud y felicidad del destinatario y por el progreso y prosperidad del pueblo argelino.

articles.title: Minju Joson comenta el disparate de Trump sobre la RPDC
articles.content:
Minju Joson comenta el disparate de Trump sobre la RPDC
Pyongyang, primero de noviembre (ACNC) -- En una reciente entrevista de prensa concedida en relacion con su inminente visita al Sur de Corea y otros paises asiaticos, Trump dijo que EE.UU. esta preparado a la perfeccion increible para hacer frente a la "provocacion del Norte de Corea" y este "tendra gran impacto" cuando sepa de esos preparativos tan excelentes. 
					En cuanto a la incorporacion del pais vecino a la "sancion anti-Norte", chismeo que "la evalua positivamente", "ambos paises mantienen relaciones excepcionalmente buenas" y ese pais "ayuda de verdad a EE.UU."
					
					Este ridiculo acto verbal del politico incapaz, quien se encuentra en el atolladero, persigue el fin de presionar militarmente a la RPDC y estrangularla con la sancion.
					
					Asi, opina el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual divulgado hoy y prosigue:
					
					El disparate de Trump deja conocer que el recurre al ultimo recurso sintiendose inquieto e impaciente por el fracaso de su intento de atropellar a la RPDC mediante la presion militar y la sancion.
					
					El ejercito y pueblo coreanos no asustaran ante ninguna chismografia de Trump y saben bien lo que deben hacer.
					
					La causa de construccion de las fuerzas armadas nucleares de la RPDC ha alcanzado ya las metas para completarlas.
					
					Lo unico que nos queda es demostrar el temperamento de la Corea del Juche para que EE.UU. no incurra mas en su fanfarronada y traer la paz al mundo.
					
					Trump y sus compinches deben actuar con control y prudencia al darse cuenta de cuan formidable es el disuasivo nuclear de justicia de la RPDC, preparado a la perfeccion realmente increible.

articles.title: Minju Joson critica connivencia militar anti-RPDC de EE.UU., Japon y Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Minju Joson critica connivencia militar anti-RPDC de EE.UU., Japon y Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, primero de noviembre (ACNC) -- Hace poco, tuvieron lugar en Filipinas las 9a conversaciones ministeriales de defensa EE.UU.-Japon-Sur de Corea con la participacion de Mattis, Onodera y Song Yong Mu.
					Con anterioridad, los ultimos dos se reunieron por separado y acordaron la "cooperacion estrecha" luego de cuestionar tanto la supuesta "amenaza nuclear del Norte (de Corea)".
					
					El rotativo Minju Joson transmitio el dia primero un comentario individual aseverando que tales discusiones colusorias revelan que se torna cada dia mas imprudente la ambicion de EE.UU., Japon y el Sur de Corea de desatar a toda costa la guerra nuclear anti-RPDC.
					
					Esas reuniones militares parten del objetivo de frenar el incremento de las fuerzas nucleares de autodefensa de la RPDC, acelerar el establecimiento de la alianza militar tripartita bajo el pretexto de la "amenaza nuclear y de misiles del Norte" y tomar asi la posicion hegemonica en la Peninsula Coreana y la region.
					
					Las imprudentes acciones militares de las fuerzas hostiles demuestran que es mil veces justa la medida de fortalecimiento del disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa de la RPDC y hay que controlar a los agresores y provocadores no con palabras sino con el fuego.
					
					Los belicistas de EE.UU., Japon y el Sur de Corea deben tener presente que si siguen andando sin justipreciar la posicion estrategica de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ni la tendencia de la epoca actual, se reducira a cenizas el territorio estadounidense, se hundira el archipielago japones en el Pacifico y se arruinara el territorio surcoreano.

articles.title: No hay cambios en el nuevo "poder" surcoreano: opina Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
No hay cambios en el nuevo "poder" surcoreano: opina Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, primero de noviembre (ACNC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun divulgo hoy un articulo individual en relacion con que se cumple un ano desde el inicio de la resistencia del pueblo surcoreano con velas encendidas en demanda de la dimision de la traidora Park Geun-hye.
					Esa lucha de gran envergadura significo la explosion del rencor e indignacion acumulados contra la traidora, adelanta el articulista y continua:
					
					La caida del "poder" de Park como resultado de la lucha con velas demostro en claro cuan tragico es el destino de los traidores que sofocan sin piedad el deseo patriotico sobre la reunificacion de toda la nacion practicando la dictadura fascista y cometiendo tremendos actos de corrupcion e irregularidades bajo el amparo de las fuerzas extranjeras.
					
					Aunque paso un ano desde el inicio de la resistencia y se cambiaron las fuerzas gobernantes, no hay cambios radicales en el Sur de Corea.
					
					Ante todo, las fuerzas conservadoras, que estuvieron a punto de colapso ante el empuje de los manifestantes con velas, recobran el aliento y desafian desesperadamente a la opinion publica reflejada en velas encendidas.
					
					En tales circunstancias, los miembros de las entidades conservadoras ultraderechistas, que se mantenian con la limosna que les tiraba su patrona Park, suelen armar tumultos saliendo a las calles para reclamar la "liberacion por inocencia" de ella.
					
					Lo peor del caso es que las actuales autoridades surcoreanas, que asumieron el poder gracias a las manifestaciones con velas, incurren en los actos traidores sin hacer caso de la opinion publica reflejada en esa lucha.
					
					La conducta imprudente de ellas, que repiten la campana conflictiva de Lee Myung Bak y Park Geun-hye, hace a los surcoreanos de diferentes sectores aspirantes a la paz y a la reunificacion convencerse de que no hay nada que esperar en el "poder" actual.
